summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to energy-efficiency and energy conservation: amending Section 22.700.010 Seattle Municipal Code ("SMC") to adopt by reference the 1997 Washington State Energy Code (WAC51-11) and to repeal the 1994 Washington State Energy Code and amendments thereto; amending 1997 Washington State Energy Code Sections 1132.3, 1144, 1150, 1161, 1162, 1310.2, 13.11.6, 1323, 1402, 1411.2, 1412.4, 1412.6, 1414.2, 1421, 1432.2, 1436, 1438, 1513.6, 1521, 1530, and Tables 13-1, 15-1, and 20-6; and adding to the 1997 Washington State Energy Code new Sections 1144.1, 1144.2, 1144.3, 1144.4, 1144.5, 1144.6, 1144.7, 1411.5, 1412.8, 1416, 1421.1, 1431.2, 1438.1, 1452, and 15137.
